fabio-vollaro-2157604b,Fabio,Vollaro,PRODUCT ASSURANCE ENGINEER at ESA ESTEC (TELESPAZIO Belgium Srl Contractor),,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E16AQEqS0MddJrVng/profile-displaybackgroundimage-shrink_350_1400/0/1643836139843?e=1697673600&v=beta&t=LWw8vcYm5TE9ZI6NsS9E7x7TJZlmVV1EcJhyCSvlrt0,personal,ACoAAAqcqzEBvlRg-mCMfQO1-GIqvMM6EOHXh6M,178039601,,"Aug. 2020 to present: Telespazio Belgium Srl - PA & safety Engineer at ESA ESTEC
- certified AS/EN9100 1st and 2nd party Auditor
- PA&S support in R&D programs and Technology Development Activities + contribution to ESA TRL Calculator development

- ESA PA focal point for Preliminary and System Requirement Review (PRR and SRR), Preliminary and Critical Design Review, (PDR and CDR), manufacturing readiness review (MRR), test readiness review and test review board (TRR and TRB), equipment qualification status and qualification reviews (EQSR and QR), materials & processes or EEE parts control boards (MPCB and PCB)
Oct. 2019 to Jul 2020: contractor at AIRBUS D&S UK - MAIT QA engineer
- Quality Assurance (QA) activities planning, MAIT plans and procedures review
- QA support for Risk Analysis, RAMS and MAIT flow analysis
- QA focal point for: Non-Conformance Review Board (NRB), Integration and Test Readiness Review (IRR and TRR), Post Test Review (PTR)
- Practical Problem-Solving methodology application on Anomalies & Non-conformances
- KIP/MIP definition and running and quality surveillance during MAIT activities
- Cleanliness and contamination control
Oct 2015 to Oct 2019: SAB Aerospace srl - PA&S Manager
- Product Assurance (PA) during assembling, integration and tests (mainly vibration, thermal-vacuum and shock) on space hardware

- PA activities (contribution to design, inspection, compliance declaration/non-compliance reporting) on manufactured flight hardware (heritage in mechanical structures for optical instruments, PLA, separation systems, test items, li-ion rechargeable Batteries for space satellites)
- Quality inspection during Manufacturing activities (mainly for metallic and CFRP parts)
- PA for the development and functionality testing of MGSE and EGSE
- Sub-contractors and industrial partners auditing and management
- Internal Quality System Management
- NCR, RFD/W and Change Proposals management
- Qualification activities planning for critical processes
- RAMS analysis on space systems and sub-systems.
Previous areas of specialization: Energetic Engineer, specialized in plants and HVAC systems and Research Fellow for volumetric reciprocating compressors and expanders
